product_name: DryGuy Thermanator Boot and Glove Dryer
long_description: A perfect addition to your mud room, the DryGuy Thermanator boot and glove dryer offers a silent, radiant heating system that accommodates four to eight boots or gloves. Wall, floor, and free-standing configurations make it easy to place in a tight space in your condo, shop or cabin. Energy efficient: 7.5 watts per boot or glove. White glossed enameled steel; easy on/off switch; compatible with 120-volt AC household outlets.
short_description: A perfect addition to your mud room, the DryGuy Thermanator boot and glove dryer offers a silent, radiant heating system that accommodates four to eight boots or gloves.
